questions.1895fa0d-2392-4680-9c1a-e02ae94a329f: I understand you're drawn to the 'nice vibes' of South America, particularly Colombia or Peru. Could you share more about what specifically attracts you to these countries? questions.1c11281c-16a1-4b5c-abbe-d2204e263125: You mentioned a preference for Southern Asia. Could you elaborate on what aspects of this region are most appealing to you? Is there anything about the cultural experiences you value that could also be found in South American countries like Colombia or Peru?
